example.context:
DappNode - Shopify Store
Receive Shopify proceeds into your multi-signature wallet.
See Example Integrate Now

DappNode uses the DePay Shopify Plugin to receive payments peer-to-peer, directly into their Gnosis Safe multi-signature wallet. Customers benefit from a seamless payment experience and an on-the-fly token conversion.

Checkout with DePay

After selecting the DappNode of their choice, customers can select DePay upon checkout to pay directly with their Web3 crypto-currency wallet.

DAppNode receives the payment directly into their Gnosis Safe multi-signature wallet.

See Example Integrate Now

interactions.response: DappNode provides customers with the ability to pay with their Web3 crypto-currency wallet directly into the Gnosis Safe multi-signature wallet. Customers can also benefit from an on-the-fly token conversion.
DePay is supported on Shopify, WooCommerce, Wordpress, and other web3 products.

The DEPAY Token is a cryptocurrency token created by DePay AG and used for DePay payments. It is an ERC-20 (Ethereum Request for Comments) token that is used to process payments, donations and other transactions across the DePay network.

responses: DappNode is an open-source platform that enables users to deploy and manage decentralized applications (Dapps) without having to possess or maintain the entire blockchain network. It allows developers to quickly and easily develop and deploy their dapps. It also provides users with access to various features and functions, such as secure storage and decentralized name resolution, that help make the use of decentralized applications smoother and more efficient.

DappNode currently supports Ethereum, EOS, and other token-based blockchains, providing an easy setup and deployment process for developers. We also offer support for Bitcoin, Filecoin, and other major decentralized protocols and networks.

The DEPAY Token is a utility token used to unlock and govern the DePay payment protocol. It provides users with access to professional tools to manage their Web3 Payments, and allows them to participate in the DePay governance process. DEPAY tokens are currently listed on exchanges such as PancakeSwap and Uniswap, and can also be acquired through various liquidity mining programs and staking rewards.
